remarks: A version of the modular law ~ pmod1i that holds in a Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 13-May-2012.)
statement:
hlmod.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlmod.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlmod.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlmod.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
hlmod.f $e |- F = ( pmap ` K ) $.
hlmod.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
hlmod1i $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .<_ Z /\ ( F ` ( X .\/ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) .+ ( F ` Y ) ) ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) ./\ Z ) = ( X .\/ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) ) ) $.
